name: Piano

sections.label: Division I - Age 7 and under (4 min)
Division II - Age 8 and under (4 min)
Division III - Age 9 and under (5 min)
Division IV - Age 10 and under (5 min)
Division V - Age 11 and under (5 min)
Division VI - Age 12 and under (6 min)
Division VII - Age 13 and under (7 min)
Division VIII - Age 14 and under (8 min)
Division IX - Age 15 and under (8 min)
Division X - Age 16 and under (10 min)
Division XI - Age 18 and under (12 min)

requirements: Select two pieces representing different periods and styles
All works must be performed by memory
Performer should bring the original copy of repertoires
No changes to the competition program are permitted once the application form has been received

name: Vocal: Classical

sections.label: CV Section I: Age 8 and under
CV Section VIII: Age 21 and above

requirements: Choose one selection from Group A and Group B in contrasting style
All original scores or sheet music purchased online must be accompanied by a receipt
Vocal participants must provide their own accompanist
Teachers may not accompany their vocal students

name: Vocal: Musical Theater

sections.label: MT Section I: Age 8 and under
MT Section VIII: Age 21 and above

requirements: Prepare two contrasting age-appropriate songs from approved musical theater repertoire
All original scores or sheet music purchased online must be accompanied by a receipt
Vocal participants must provide their own accompanist
Teachers may not accompany their vocal students

name: Strings + Piano Chamber

sections.label: Section I - Age 8 and under (6 min)
Section II - Age 10 and under (7 min)
Section III - Age 13 and under (8 min)
Section IV - Age 16 and under (9 min)
Section V - Age 19 and under (10 min)

requirements: More than 2 and up to 6 members in a group
Strings only: String Duo, String Trio, String Quartet, String Quintet or Sextet
Strings + Piano: Piano Trio, Piano Quartet, Piano Quintet or Sextet
Memorization is NOT required
Repertoire must be chosen from the standard literature and should demonstrate excellent musicianship and proper technique
It is okay to finish the performance before the time limit
No change in the repertoire is allowed following submission of the application
At least ONE Score needs to be given to the judges
All members of the group can use an original copy or sheet music from the public domain
Taking pictures or video recording is NOT allowed inside the competition room
Section is determined by the age of the OLDEST MEMBER as of April 30

name: Strings

sections.label: Section I - Age 6 and under (3 min)

requirements: Memorization is REQUIRED
A piece requires a piano accompaniment and each entrant must provide his or her own accompanist EXCEPT FOR the VIOLA division
Only VIOLA division allows a piece written for unaccompanied solo to be performed without accompaniment
Repertoire must be chosen from the standard literature and should demonstrate excellent musicianship and proper technique
Only ONE movement or ONE piece is required
Cut is allowed however it needs to be clearly marked in the original score for the judges
It is okay to finish the performance before the time limit
No change in the repertoire is allowed following submission of the application
At least ONE ORIGINAL Score needs to be given to the judges
Accompanists are allowed to use a photocopy of the original score or the music from the public domain
Taking pictures or video recording is NOT allowed inside the competition room

name: Guitar Chamber Music

sections.label: Section I - Age 7 and under (3 min)

requirements: Up to 5 members in the ensemble
Memorization is NOT required
Each ensemble should present TWO contrasting pieces
All members must use original (not photocopied) sheet music
Section is determined by the age of the OLDEST MEMBER

name: Classical Guitar

sections.label: Section I - Age 7 and under (3 min)

requirements: Memorization is required for all divisions
Each participant should present TWO contrasting pieces
No changes in repertoire are allowed following submission of the application

name: Woodwinds

sections.label: Section I - Age 11 and under (5 min)

requirements: Memorization is required
Only one piece OR one movement of a multi-movement work is required
No cutting or rearranging the music is permitted, except for the piano part
Each entrant must provide his or her own pianist
